document_data.mainbody: Storm walk is a spell of the evocation school used by sorcerers, most often those with a taste for the entropic forces of wild magic. Storm walk, when cast, makes each step of the sorcerer for a brief, momentary stride of five feet impact the ground with a thunderous clap, injuring a creature of the sorcerers choice fifty feet or less away from their original location. The spells power is determined by the sorcerers charisma, as well as the sorcerers degree of experience. As one of the most basic spells cast by sorcerers, storm walk the power needed to cast storm walk recharges instantaneously.
